Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Quality Hotel Tabcorp Park in Melton South, you'll be minutes from Tabcorp Park. This 4-star motel is within the region of Galli Estate Winery and Watergardens Town Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 41 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and separate sitting areas.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle that operates within 10 km.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Quality Hotel Tabcorp Park. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this motel consist of a conference center and conference space. A train station pick-up service is provided at no charge, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Quality Hotel Tabcorp Park. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tabcorp Park - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Galli Estate Winery - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Watergardens Town Centre - 15.2 km / 9.4 mi
Galaxy Land - 16.3 km / 10.1 mi
Sunbury Visitor Information Centre - 17.6 km / 10.9 mi
Goonawarra Golf Club - 18 km / 11.2 mi
Woodlands Historic Park - 22.1 km / 13.7 mi
Werribee District Historical Society and Museum - 23.1 km / 14.3 mi

Highpoint Shopping Centre - 26.4 km / 16.4 mi

Point Cook Coastal Park - 27.5 km / 17.1 mi

The preferred airport for Quality Hotel Tabcorp Park is Melbourne, VIC (MEL-Tullamarine) - 21.9 km / 13.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
